name: Snowdrop Solutions
slogan: Innovation software firm leveraging location intelligence for key sectors in UK/Worldwide
description:
Snowdrop helps organisations to maximise the value of Google Maps Platform through service experiences that drive consumer adoption, user engagement and online transactions. From the latest digital mapping capabilities and deployments, to specialised support and customer care.  

With an outstanding track record of map successes - in multiple customers, sectors and territories; Snowdrop works as Google Cloud and Maps Platform Premier Partner across EMEA and Asia Pacific.

jobs.title: Senior Software Developer
jobs.description:
The life of a Software Developer in Snowdrop is challenging. To succeed you need to be comfortable with change, the speed of innovation of Google and our customers, and be happy to think about multiple options to further your career and capabilities.

A successful Developer in Snowdrop is open to the broader technology stack of Google Cloud Platform, and willing to explore and identify the best ways to use innovative software to solve real-world problems and contribute to powerful product and service offerings.

Essential Experience

Familiarity with Google Cloud Platform and/or AWS for hands-on deployment of applications
Strength in a front end language such as Java
Capabilities in server-side technology for web deployment, ideally using Open Source software
Willingness to achieve Google Cloud Platform Technical Accreditation/Credentials which will be paid for
Well organized and detail-oriented
Desirable Skills

BigQuery
SQL
Data Studio
Docker/Kubernetes
Git
Agile methodology
Familiarity as an end-user with G Suite
An ideal candidate will have

The desire to see robust code scaling in global deployments
Over three years of work with cloud-based software
The ability to confidently raise and communicate project, development or deployment concerns
A calm approach to continually improving individual skills as well as  software
Confidence to speak with customers as a technical authority for Google Maps Platform
What we offer

25 days holiday & Public Holidays
Flexible working hours
Flexible working location including representation in Google/Customer offices (not extended periods)
Expensed travel, including within the UK
Occasional travel to Spain, USA and possible travel to Asia

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description:
Snowdrop Solutions is a leading provider of location and mapping services for fintech, real estate and travel/transport sectors in Europe and SE Asia. As a Premier Google Maps Partner, Snowdrop is seeking a **passionate and empathetic product manager to join our Bath offices**. We are a small, cross-functional team focused on building products and services that create delightful consumer experiences for our customers.

We are seeking a Product Manager to help define, design and build scalable location-based tools in the banking and travel sectors. This role is one of a **product expert, working closely with technical development teams** and is responsible for identifying, understanding and capturing requirements as well as preparing technical requirements for the development team.

You will work closely with internal stakeholders and key customers as part of taking products from concept through to deployment.

You enjoy understanding the underlying technology and its future capabilities as there is a strong technical element in this role.
